author: Sabrina Ghayour
method: Carefully squeeze out and discard the excess water from the grated cucumber – you can do this by hand or in a sieve. Place the grated cucumber in a mixing bowl and mix in the yogurt. Add the garlic and dill, mix well and season to taste with sea salt and black pepper. Serve with a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil.
ingredients: 1 large cucumber, coarsely grated or finely diced ,  500ml/18fl oz Greek yoghurt,  1 large garlic clove, crushed,  20g/¾oz dill, stalks and leaves finely chopped,  sea salt and freshly ground black pepper,  extra virgin olive oli, for drizzling
